entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
